plot outline: Widow marriage is still considered a sin in progressive society of india even today.Film Amar prem raise questions on mentality of indian society and cover issues like widow marriage and honor killings.Film revolves around girl Rama, she get married to love of her life but finds herself lonely again after death of her husband. Rama face strong resistance from her family and society when she decide to marry again.
